WhyPrimeSetup.title: Why Choose Prime Setup for Business Setup in Dubai
WhyPrimeSetup.subtitle: Setting up a business in Dubai is a major step-Prime Setup makes it simple, secure, and efficient. With over 15 years of experience, we have helped hundreds of entrepreneurs and companies establish themselves in the UAE, guiding them through every legal and administrative detail so they can focus on growth.

card.title: How to open a company in Dubai: Step-by-step instructions
card.subtitle: Starting a business in Dubai is easy. We tell you where to start, what documents you need and how long the registration process takes.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Here are answers to common questions
faq.question1: Why should I start a business in Dubai?
faq.answer1: Dubai offers tax advantages, a stable economy, and a strategic location.
faq.question2: How to open a business in Dubai?
faq.answer2: Choose a zone, company type, get a license, and open a bank account.
faq.question3: What types of business licenses are available in Dubai?
faq.answer3: Commercial, professional, and industrial â€” depending on the business activity.
faq.question4: What are the main steps to starting a company in Dubai?
faq.answer4: Choose jurisdiction, register the company, get licensed, and open a bank account.
faq.question5: How much does it cost to start a business in Dubai?
faq.answer5: Cost depends on zone and activity type, starting from $5,000.
faq.question6: Can foreigners own 100% of their business in Dubai?
faq.answer6: Yes, in free zones and in some mainland cases.
